title: Understanding Probability
text: Probability is the measure of the likelihood of an event occurring. It is calculated by dividing the number of favorable outcomes by the total number of possible outcomes.

title: Identify Favorable Outcomes
text: In this scenario, the favorable outcomes are the number of blue marbles in the bag.

title: Calculate Total Outcomes
text: The total number of outcomes is the total number of marbles in the bag.

title: Calculate Probability
text: Use the formula: Probability $$=$$ (Number of favorable outcomes) / (Total number of outcomes).
